chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hello hola
hola, amigo! i'm at the starting point, there's a twig to my left, leading to a small island with a tiger
¿Qué camino debo tomar?
straight
okay, so i'm at the small island with the tiger now
i see a butterfly to the southeast and a parrot to the southwest. ¿hacia dónde me dirijo ahora?
go to the parrot
i'm now at the big island with the parrot sitting on a tree
i see an elephant to my left, rocks to the south-east and a frog on an island. ¿cuál es mi próximo movimiento?
frog and then the past the alligator
alright, i visited the frog and just passed by the crocodile
Estoy de vuelta en la isla con el gran elefante. ¿Qué sigue, amigo?
go to the rocks then left past the giraffe then past the snake to the treasure
woohoo, past the giraffe, and snake and finally, i found the treasure! juego terminado, amigo! *finished*
hi there, empezamos?
where should i go
move a bit west first, under the wooden bench on your left. then, just across the trail, you will see a florist's stand
Dirígete cerca de allí, ¡pero no demasiado! haz un rápido giro en U a tu izquierda y trota de regreso por el sendero hacia ese perro blanco. ¿entiendo?
im to the right of the stand
great job! now, cross over the wooden branch and keep going down the map
you should see another white dog chilling next to a checkered picnic mat. approach it but don't stop there!
im to the left of the red picnic mat
bravo! now we're cooking! head over the mat and slide past the bowl of berries
¡Prepárate para avanzar hacia el oeste, amigo mío!
okay im in between the berry and the dog
okay, dope! look around for another branch, yep, the one across the river
cross it heading north. you got this, compadre
back to the starting point?
no, not quite
¡Lo estás haciendo genial! Una vez que hayas cruzado ese río, evita tocar el arbusto verde. en su lugar, haz un círculo desde la derecha y llegarás al puesto de la floristería.
im next to the white dog and the bowl of berries where should i go
perfect! now, make a left turn at the florist's stand, then head down towards the huge bridge
did you notice the cyclists?  keep going west, buddy.
okay im north of the old people right now
Genial, ¡lo estás haciendo muy bien! Ahora, dirígete hacia el sur unos pasos, justo entre los ancianos en el banco y otra rama de madera.
okay what next
deberías ver un arbusto verde, amigo mío
right at the end of the branch
okay now what
nice! now head east
mantén la rama a tu izquierda y el arbusto a tu derecha
im almost at the deer laying down now what
¡y eso es todo, mi amigo! ¡has llegado al objetivo final! ese joven venado marrón era lo que estabas buscando
well done!
hola, you ready?
yes
great! starting at the north, at the tent
¿Cómo debo proceder?

past the dog then left to the grill the left in between the dog and campfire then go in between the campfire and the mushrooms then all the way down in between the telescope and the bush thats to the right then go west and to the cabin
smashing. so, we're off, passing the dog, going between the campfire and mushroom, straight down between telescope and bush
now heading west. and voila! cabin sighted. *finished* did we nail it or what?
hi there, empezamos?
okay whats the final ending point?

that's a surprise, my friend! let's start the journey and we'll see where it takes us! now move under the tree in front of you to the south-west. cross the second palm tree, then turn sharply left before hitting the third one
continuar hacia el sur. ¿entiendo?
yes
perfecto! keep moving a few steps then veer slightly left, bypass the cute brown puppy over there, then make a right turn to keep heading south
you're nailing this!
okay
alright, you're doing great! next, there’s this pair of rocks, one big on your left, and a smaller one on your right, walk right between 'em
¡Saluda al océano de mi parte cuando llegues allí!
okay
cool! now dip your toes into the water, see that big red crab? say hi, then veer right, keeping close to the big rock and keep moving west in the water
okay
great job! now keep going till you come across a medium sized rock
when you spot a shark (don't worry, it's friendly), make a sharp right. almost there, pal!
okay
fantastic! now let's go back to land
¿Ves la roca mediana y una bola de colores? simplemente camina por allí y luego continúa hacia el norte.
ok
good stuff! now tilt a bit to your left and head towards the north-west, passing between a red tent and a big speaker
trust me, we're close!
ok
excellent, now give a spin around that red tent and then head south towards the sea
pero detente en la orilla, ¡no volverás a nadar! gira a la derecha allí y camina bajo el kayak rojo brillante.
ok
awesome
take a sharp turn to your right, walk along the kayak, and there you go! you've reached a small green bush! great job, buddy! that's the end of our journey! how did you like it?
